name: Ronny's Life
description:
Only for PC!

Help Ronny get the job at Bakery Jackson! 

Ronny is moving out from his grandpa, and into the big world. After buying a little house, he realizes that he has no money left. He applies for a job at Bakery Jackson, and Jackson himself gives Ronny a 30 day trial period to see if he is worthy for the job. Your mission is to complete all the 30 days without failure!

Can you do it?
